name: Verify complete order lifecycle: create, retrieve, update status, delete
description: Validates the complete lifecycle of an order from creation to deletion, ensuring data integrity at each step
descriptionHtml: Validates the complete lifecycle of an order from creation to deletion, ensuring data integrity at each step
